title: Nine
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR70L
description: The book, Nine, uses the number nine in different farm situations. Each page illustrates a farm animal to match the written text. The bright and colorful pictures are fun to look at, and students can count all nine animals in each one. They will also have fun searching for the hidden 9 on each page.
meta: bulls, chickens, cows, geese, goats, horses, nine, pigs, sheep
Use the reading strategy of visualizing to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Initial Sound : Orally discriminate initial sounds
Plural Nouns : Recognize and use plural nouns
